author: Ryan Daws
description:
Google has broken with years of tradition by not releasing the Pixel hardware repositories alongside this week’s Android 16 source code. The move has left custom ROM creators scratching their heads and scrambling to adjust their plans. Tuesday saw Google push Android 16’s source code to the Android Open Source Project (AOSP) as expected, but... Read more »

The post Android’s open future questioned after Google withholds Pixel code appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Android’s open future questioned after Google withholds Pixel code
